de.hochschule.bremen.minerva.commons.vo
Class World

java.lang.Object
  de.hochschule.bremen.minerva.commons.vo.ValueObject
      de.hochschule.bremen.minerva.commons.vo.World
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class World
extends ValueObject

Represents a world with countries and a country graph, which stores the country/neighbour-mapping.

Since:
1.0
Version:
$Id: World.java 805 2010-07-06 01:16:23Z andre.koenig $
See Also:
Country, CountryGraph, Serialized Form

setMapUnderlay

public void setMapUnderlay(java.lang.String filename)
Sets the map underlay filename. The map underlay is the second image, which represents the country colors. This map is necessary for the recognition which country the player has selected.

Parameters:
filename - The map underlay filename.

getCountry

public Country getCountry(java.awt.Color byColor)
Returns a country by an given color.

Parameters:
byColor -
Returns:
The country reference. If no country was found with the given color, then the country is empty.

areNeighbours

public boolean areNeighbours(Country one,
                             Country two)
Wrapper method for hiding the country graph. Checks if two given countries are connected or not.

Parameters:
one - - The first country
two - - The second country
Returns:
true/false

hasNeighbours

public boolean hasNeighbours(Country country)
Wrapper method for hiding the country graph. Checks if a given country has neighboring countries.

Parameters:
country - - Has this county neighbours?
Returns:
true/false
See Also:
Country

getNeighbours

public java.util.Vector<Country> getNeighbours(Country country)
Wrapper method for hiding the country graph. Returns a country vector which represents the neighbouring countries by an given country.

Parameters:
country - The country whose neighbours we are searching for.
Returns:
A vector with all neighbours from an specific country.
